Folks, I leave these on to seed about 7-10 days, 24 hours a day. That is plenty long enough to download. There is only so much hard drive space, & I wait until the torrent shows prolonged inactivity, before removing it. & although it may take me awhile to recheck old uploads, I will put anything back on that anyone requests. That's as good as I think can be done.
